querystring.select: SELECT A.APP_NO AS AppNo, A.PROD_OFFERING_NAME AS ProdOfferingName, AC.CUST_NAME As CustName, POH.PURCHASE_ORDER_NO AS PurchaseOrderNo, AG.AGRMNT_NO AS AgrmntNo, POH.PURCHASE_ORDER_DT AS PurchaseOrderDt, POH.PURCHASE_ORDER_EXPIRED_DT AS PurchaseOrderExpiredDt, AA.SUPPL_NAME AS SupplName, POH.TOTAL_PURCHASE_ORDER_AMT AS TotalPurchaseOrderAmt, POH.NUM_OF_EXTENSION AS NumOfExtension, (CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATETIME, SCC.SYS_VALUE), POH.PURCHASE_ORDER_EXPIRED_DT) < 0 THEN 0 ELSE DATEDIFF(DAY,CONVERT(DATETIME, SCC.SYS_VALUE), POH.PURCHASE_ORDER_EXPIRED_DT) END) AS RemainingDays
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP A WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AC.APP_ID JOIN dbo.AGRMNT AG WITH(NOLOCK) ON A.APP_ID = AG.APP_ID JOIN dbo.APP_ASSET AA ON AA.AGRMNT_ID = AG.AGRMNT_ID JOIN dbo.PURCHASE_ORDER_H POH WITH(NOLOCK) ON AG.AGRMNT_ID = POH.AGRMNT_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.V_SYS_CTRL_COY SCC WITH(NOLOCK) ON 1=1 AND SCC.SYS_KEY = 'BusinessDate'
